snippet: The Olympic silver medalist Leo Manzano will challenge the defending champion Bernard Lagat in the Fifth Avenue Mile in Manhattan on Sept. 22.
abstract: Olympic silver medalist Leo Manzano will challenge the defending champion Bernard Lagat in the Fifth Avenue Mile in Manhattan.
